# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="9d860-102">Pridanie príznaky a pripomenutia v službe Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9d860-103">Nastaviť alebo upraviť pripomenutie udalosti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="9d860-104">Prejdite do [kalendára](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="9d860-105">Vyberte udalosť, ktorú chcete byť upozornení, vyberte šípky v pravom hornom rohu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="9d860-106">rozbaľte ho.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="9d860-107">Vedľa **mi pripomínajú**, vyberte čas pripomenutia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="9d860-108">Outlook.com automaticky uloží vaše zmeny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9d860-109">Na pripomenutie, aby nadviazala na správu, môžete pridať príznak:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="9d860-110">Ísť na [poštu](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="9d860-111">V zozname správ ukázaním správu a pozrite sa na flag voľba.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="9d860-112">Vyberte ikonu príznaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="9d860-113">označte správu príznakom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9d860-114">Zobraziť všetky vaše správy označené príznakom, začiarknite políčko v ľavom dolnom rohu stránky prejsť k úlohám.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="9d860-115">Ďalšie informácie, prečítajte si [vlajku alebo pin správy v službe Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9d860-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
